column2: VARDESC
In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER… (PAUSE) More than once want to cut down on your tobacco use?
In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER… (PAUSE) More than once want to cut down on your tobacco use?  Did this happen in the last 12 months?
In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER… (PAUSE) Give up or cut down on activities that you were interested in or that gave you pleasure because tobacco use was not permitted at the activity?

In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER… (PAUSE) Give up or cut down on activities that you were interested in or that gave you pleasure because tobacco use was not permitted at the activity?  Did this happen in the last 12 months?

In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER… (PAUSE) Give up or cut down on activities that were important to you — like associating with friends or relatives or attending social activities — because tobacco use was not permitted at the activity?

In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER… (PAUSE) Give up or cut down on activities that were important to you — like associating with friends or relatives or attending social activities — because tobacco use was not permitted at the activity?  Did this happen in the last 12 months?
In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER… (PAUSE) Continue to use tobacco even though you knew it was causing you a health problem or making a health problem worse?
In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER… (PAUSE) Continue to use tobacco even though you knew it was causing you a health problem or making a health problem worse?  Did this happen in the last 12 months?
In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER… (PAUSE) Find yourself chain smoking/using one pinch or plug of snuff or chewing tobacco right after another.?
In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER… (PAUSE) Find yourself chain smoking/using one pinch or plug of snuff or chewing tobacco right after another.?  Did this happen in the last 12 months?
In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER… (PAUSE) More than once try to stop or cut down on your tobacco use but found you couldn’t do it?

CHECK ITEM 3.4: Are at least 2 items marked “Yes" in column b, 7 a. - 7 h.?

You just mentioned that you had some experiences after stopping or cutting down on your tobacco use in the last 12 months. Were any of these experiences very uncomfortable or upsetting to you or did they cause problems in your life — like at work or school or with family or friends?

You just mentioned that you had some experiences after stopping or cutting down on your tobacco use in the last 12 months. Were any of these experiences very uncomfortable or upsetting to you or did they cause problems in your life — like at work or school or with family or friends?  Did this happen in the last 12 months?
Did you use tobacco in the last 12 months to keep from having any of these experiences?
Wake up in the middle of the night to use tobacco?
Wake up in the middle of the night to use tobacco?  Did this happen in the last 12 months?
Often use tobacco just after getting up or shortly after getting up in the morning?
Often use tobacco just after getting up or shortly after getting up in the morning?  Did this happen in the last 12 months?

Find yourself using tobacco JUST AFTER being in a situation where tobacco use was not permitted — like after being on a plane, at a meeting, or shopping at the mall?  Did this happen in the last 12 months?
Find that you had to use much more tobacco than you once did to get the effect you wanted?
Find that you had to use much more tobacco than you once did to get the effect you wanted?  Did this happen in the last 12 months?
Increase your use of tobacco by at least 50 percent?
Increase your use of tobacco by at least 50 percent?  Did this happen in the last 12 months?

Have a period when you often used tobacco more than you intended to?  Did this happen in the last 12 months?
